name: Kevin Miller
presentations: Agile and Scrum using Team Foundation Server
Attacking the System: SQL Injection Attacks
The Social Engineering Savants – The Psychopathic Profile
Creating an Application Performance Monitoring Solution for .NET Applications
My Team is Awesome and Yours Is Too

projects.title: Grant Reccomendation Project
projects.description: An evaluation of business processes, and development of a new application to update user interface for clients and drive greater efficiencies in the organization.
responsibilities: Lead architect on front end architecture.

projects.title: Web Component Framework
projects.description: A user interface framwork designed specifically to handle the client branding requirements of RenPSG.  The component framework aimes to take the client for development from weeks to 3 days or less.

projects.title: Data Archival Project
projects.description: System to scan the database for records meeting certain criteria, remove them from the client installation, send them to the center, and verify the contents with stored records.

projects.title: T2 Lunch and Learns
projects.description: A semi-monthly activity where an internal or external person teaches the development group on a topic.

projects.title: Software Development Restructuring Initiative
projects.description: A team formed to evaulate the current Agile process at T2 and devise solutions for problems and frustrations by the staff.
responsibilities: Meet with executive staff members to determine direction.
Drive project goals within the team.
Facilitate discussion and determine underlying cause for ineffieciences and team frustrations.

projects.title: User Migration Strategy for New Architecture
Database Administration
projects.description: Monitor the centeral transaction server and data warehouse MSSQL Servers along with troubleshooting the 300+ client SQL Server installations.
responsibilities: Review and reccomenation of RTO and RPO schedules

responsbilities: Design discussion and prototyping of application migration to Azure.
PCI compliance liason for the T2 Ascent product.

projects.title: Department of Natural Resources Project – Unity
projects.description: A complete rewrite of the existing legacy system designed to track all information concerning water quantity and location (streams, lakes, dams, wells, etc.).
responsibilities: Software configuration management design and administration.

projects.title: Microsoft Partnership Coordination
projects.description: TCC has a gold partnership with Microsoft granting special licensing, training, and sales opportunities
responsibilities: Demonstrated to senior management its importance and benefits.
Administrated all aspects of the program.
Reviewed licenses available to TCC through the program and aligned sales, marketing, and operations needs with available software.
Realigned developer necessities with available software.

projects.title: Internship Program
projects.description: A community outreach program designed to evaluate and hire students after graduating.
responsibilities: Evaluated and hired students interested in development.
Trained interns and managed projects (System Monitoring, Applicant Tracking, TypeScript Parser and CodeMap Generator, Real Time Server Monitoring System).

projects.title: TCC Meetup
projects.description: A monthly meetup group designed to engage the community for the purposes of training the TCC staff and helping with name recognition.
responsibilities: Reviewed and recruited both staff and people outside of TCC to give presentations.
Handled community outreach initiatives to attract people outside of TCC to attend.

projects.title: Authorization AI
projects.description: The system responsible for handling authentication and authorization.  It allowed users to share a common logon across all products.

projects.title: Workflow Engine
projects.description: The system designed to integrate into different modules requiring a state machine to administrate and track workflows.

projects.title: Enterprise AI
projects.description: A series of independent modules with a common framework offered as a single package to consumers.
responsibilities: Design and implementation of the system to allow client segregated databases from a single implementation.

employment.description: Responsible for creating and maintaining applications surrounding scheduling and proctoring assessments, software configuration management, and system monitoring.
responsbilities: Proposed and consulted with the infrastructure team to select and purchase network monitoring software to prepare for third party audits.
Consulted with the infrastructure team on production application access.
Created requirements for the software change management process.  Outlined the necessary steps and reviewed systems to provide recommendations on implementation.
Provided requirements and proposed solution for an automation testing framework.  Helped with the initial training and implementation of the Ranorex test suite.
Proposed and implemented the solution to track and report application performance.
Proposed and helped implement Redis state server.  Consulted to provide access controls securing stored information against attack vectors.

employment.description: Responsible for creating and maintaining applications surrounding scheduling and proctoring assessments, software configuration management, and system monitoring.
